mapper.select: SELECT pid as "pid", t.`code` as "code", t.nameCn as "nameCn", t.nameEn as "nameEn", t.shortName as "shortName", t.tempPcode as "tempPcode" FROM t_area t ORDER BY t.code

SELECT CONCAT('r-', t.id) AS "codeId", t.`code` as "code", t.nameCn as "name", t.nameCn as "nameCn", t.shortName as "shortName", t.tempPcode as "parentId", 'false' AS "checked", 'false' AS "open" FROM t_area t ORDER BY t.code

SELECT CONCAT('r-', t.id) AS "codeId", t.`code` as "code", t.nameCn as "name", t.nameCn as "nameCn", t.shortName as "shortName", t.tempPcode as "parentId", (CASE WHEN t1.cityCode IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END) AS "checked", (CASE WHEN t1.cityCode IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END) AS "open" FROM t_area t LEFT JOIN t_loan_city t1 ON t.CODE = t1.cityCode and t1.loanId = #{loanId} ORDER BY t.code

select t.provinceName, t1.cityName, t1.cityEn, t1.cityCode, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.districtName) as 'districtNames' from t_province t JOIN t_city t1 on t.provinceID = t1.provinceId JOIN t_district t2 on t1.cityId = t2.cityId group by t.provinceID,t1.cityId ORDER BY t1.cityCode
select SUBSTR(t.cityEn,1,1) cityEn,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(t.cityName)) cityName from t_city t GROUP BY SUBSTR(t.cityEn,1,1) ORDER BY SUBSTR(t.cityEn,1,1),t.cityCode
SELECT nameCn FROM t_area WHERE tempPcode = (SELECT tempPcode from t_area where nameCn = #{cityName} and `level` = 2 LIMIT 1) AND `level` = 1;
